meanings.definition: A book containing stories, especially for children.
meanings.sent2: I bought a new storybook for my niece's birthday.
meanings.sent3: The storybook characters came to life and had a party on the pages.
meanings.sent4: Her imagination soared as she flipped through the storybook.
meanings.sent5: The storybook opened a magical world of adventure for the young readers.

meanings.definition: Relating to or characteristic of stories in books.
meanings.sent1: The library had a special section for storybook tales.
meanings.sent2: She loved the storybook illustrations in her favorite novel.
meanings.sent3: The storybook cover was so captivating that she couldn't resist buying it.
meanings.sent4: His storytelling had a storybook quality that captivated the audience.
meanings.sent5: The cozy reading nook was filled with storybook charm and warmth.
